name: SigmaRaven
_source: speak;SigmaRaven;What the hell do you want? I'm trying to enjoy some fresh rabbit meat here.
speak;SigmaRaven;*sniff* Is that...curry? Japanese curry? Nevermind, give me some of that.
speak;SigmaRaven;Join you? Do you think I'm that cheap?
speak;SigmaRaven;You're absolutely right. Give me that curry.
